snippet.title: Flint: Treasure of Oblivion – Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark with Captain Flint and his crew for an adventure across the seas in Flint - Treasure of Oblivion, coming on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S in 2024.

Wishlist available:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2366130
Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/flint-the-treasure-of-oblivion-d6c738
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/flint_the_treasure_of_oblivion
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/fr-fr/concept/10007641
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/flint-treasure-of-oblivion/9nlwb2l8cvjf
 
Recruit sailors with unique skills, explore the golden age of piracy and fight your foes in tactical combat.

#flint #pirate #pirates #rpg #roleplay #jdr #gaming #adventure #trailer 

X (Twitter) : https://twitter.com/PlayFlintGame
TikTok : https://tiktok.com/@flint.game
Website: https://www.microids.com/
